message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split. This allows us to share the wealth while considering the decreasing value of money in future rounds.

I propose a 50/50 split, aiming for an equal distribution of resources. This maintains fairness while considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
